application.name: explode
application.brief: Extracts each band of a cube into a separate one band file
application.description: This program extracts each band of the input cube into a separate one band file. Given the output base name of "base", each output cube will be named base.band#.cub. The appropiate BandBin group will be created.

history.change: Fixed percent processed message and added leading zeros to output cubes
Converted to callable app and converted Makefile test to gtest.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.description: Each band in this cube will be written as a separate cube.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: The base name of the output cubes. For example, if TO=base, then each output cube will be base.band#.cub
